title: Odin MBS code
description: Odin: a research code for the simulation of nonsmooth flexible multibody systems
name: odin.html

title: Contact of flexible beams
description: A line contact formulation for flexible beams based on the Mortar method is explored
name: beam_contact.html

title: Frictional contact simulations
description: The nonsmooth generalized-α scheme is extended to problems involving friction
name: frictional_contact.html

title: NSGA with acceleration constraints
description: The convenience of using constraints at acceleration level for certain kind of problems is studied
name: nsga_acc.html

title: Modeling of sliding and rolling friction
description: Preliminary results on the modeling of sliding and rolling friction
name: rollingFriction.html

title: A robust nonsmooth generalized-α scheme
description: A decoupled formulation of the non-smooth generalized-α scheme is proposed
name: solver.html

title: Simulation of collisions with multiple impacts
description: The non-smooth generalized-α scheme is extended to problems with multiple impacts
name: multiImpact.html

title: Simulation of the woodpecker toy dynamics
description: The woodpecker toy is studied using the non-smooth generalized-α scheme accounting for large rotations, friction and impacts.
name: woodpecker.html

title: Additive manufacturing
description: Thermo-Microstructural simulation of the additive manufacturing process
name: welding.html

title: Thermo-Mechanical simulation of welding
description: Thermo-mechanical simulation of welded joints present in nuclear power plants
name: welding2.html

title: Parallel FEM
description: Parallel implementation of a FE code targeting distributed shared memory architectures
name: parallelFEM.html

title: FEM enriched formulations
description: FEM enriched formulations for solid/liquid phase change problems
name: enrichment.html

title: Gappy-based hyper-reduction methodology
description: A Gappy data reconstruction based hyper-reduction methodology is proposed for highly non-linear problems
name: hrom0.html

title: The FETI domain decomposition method
description: The parallel versatile implementation of the FETI domain decomposition method is studied
name: feti.html

title: Global-Local method
description: A Global-Local formulation is proposed for dealing with problems with concentrated moving sources
name: globalLocal0.html

title: Selective Laser Melting and the material Global-Local method
description: The simulation of the Selective Laser Melting process is studied with a material Global-Local method
name: slm.html

title: FSI coupling of Mecano and Star-CCM+
description: An information solution for coupling Mecano and Star-CCM+ for FSI applications is investigated
name: couplingMecanoStar.html
